flawed_nl_solution:

This student's proportion right is 0.88 because 35 / 40 = <<35/40=0.88>>0.88
This student got a 87.5% because 0.88 x 100 = <<0.88*100=87.5>>87.5
The student got got a 95% got 38 right because 40 x 0.95 = <<40*0.95=38>>38
Hannah needs to get 39 questions right because 38 + 1 = <<38+1=39>>39
